de.thesycon.usbio.structs
Class USBIO_ISO_PACKET

java.lang.Object
  de.thesycon.usbio.structs.USBIO_BASE_STRUCT
      de.thesycon.usbio.structs.USBIO_ISO_PACKET
public class USBIO_ISO_PACKET
extends USBIO_BASE_STRUCT

The USBIO_ISO_PACKET class defines the size and location of a single isochronous data packet within an isochronous data transfer buffer.

Field Summary
 int Length
          Specifies the size, in bytes, of the isochronous packet.
 int Offset
          Specifies the offset, in bytes, of the isochronous packet, relative to the start of the data buffer.
static int SIZE
           
 int Status
          After the isochronous read or write request is completed by the USBIO driver this field specifies the completion status of the isochronous packet.

Field Detail

SIZE

public static final int SIZE
See Also:
Constant Field Values

Offset

public int Offset
Specifies the offset, in bytes, of the isochronous packet, relative to the start of the data buffer. This parameter has to be specified by the caller for isochronous read and write operations.

Length

public int Length
Specifies the size, in bytes, of the isochronous packet. This parameter has to be specified by the caller for write operations. On read operations this field is set by the USBIO driver when the read request is completed.

Status

public int Status
After the isochronous read or write request is completed by the USBIO driver this field specifies the completion status of the isochronous packet.
